verses.verse: (A Prayer <WH8605> of the Afflicted, when he is faint, and pours out his complaint) (before the Lord. <WH3068>) Hear <WH8085> my prayer, O Lord! And let my cry <WH7775> for help <WH7775> come <WH935> to Thee.

Do not hide <WH5641> Thy face <WH6440> from me in the day <WH3117> of my distress; <WH9496> Incline <WH5186> Thine ear <WH241> to me; In the day <WH3117> when I call <WH7121> answer <WH6030> me quickly. <WH4118>
For my days <WH3117> have been <WH3615> consumed <WH3615> in smoke, <WH6227> And my bones <WH6106> have been scorched <WH2787> like a hearth. <WH4168>
My heart <WH3820> has been smitten <WH5221> like grass <WH6212> and has withered <WH3001> away, Indeed, <WH3588> I forget <WH7911> to eat <WH398> my bread. <WH3899>
Because <WH4480> of the loudness <WH6963> of my groaning <WH585> My bones <WH6106> cling <WH1692> to my flesh. <WH1320>
I resemble <WH1819> a pelican <WH6893> of the wilderness; <WH4057> I have become <WH1961> like an owl <WH9205> of the waste <WH2723> places. <WH2723>
I lie <WH8245> awake, <WH8245> I have become <WH1961> like a lonely <WH909> bird <WH6833> on a housetop. <WH1406>
My enemies <WH340> have reproached <WH2778> me all <WH3605> day <WH3117> long; Those who deride <WH1984> me have used <WH7650> my [name] as a curse. <WH7650>
For I have eaten <WH398> ashes <WH665> like bread, <WH3899> And mingled <WH4537> my drink <WH8250> with weeping, <WH1065>
Because <WH4480> <WH6440> of Thine indignation <WH2195> and Thy wrath; <WH7110> For Thou hast lifted <WH5375> me up and cast <WH7993> me away. <WH7993>
My days <WH3117> are like a lengthened <WH5186> shadow; <WH6738> And I wither <WH3001> away like grass. <WH6212>
But Thou, O Lord, <WH3068> dost abide <WH3427> forever; <WH5769> And Thy name <WH2143> to all <WH1755> generations. <WH1755>
Thou wilt arise <WH6965> [and] have <WH7355> compassion <WH7355> on Zion; <WH6726> For it is time <WH6256> to be gracious <WH2603> to her, For the appointed <WH4150> time <WH4150> has come. <WH935>
Surely <WH3588> Thy servants <WH5650> find <WH7521> pleasure <WH7521> in her stones, <WH68> And feel <WH2603> pity <WH2603> for her dust. <WH6083>
So the nations <WH1471> will fear <WH3372> the name <WH8034> of the Lord, <WH3068> And all <WH3605> the kings <WH4428> of the earth <WH776> Thy glory. <WH9202>
For the Lord <WH3068> has built <WH1129> up Zion; <WH6726> He has appeared <WH7200> in His glory. <WH9202>
He has regarded <WH6437> the prayer <WH8605> of the destitute, <WH6199> And has not despised <WH959> their prayer. <WH8605>
This <WH384> will be written <WH3789> for the generation <WH1755> to come; <WH314> That a people <WH5971> yet to be created <WH1254> may praise <WH1984> the Lord. <WH3050>
For He looked <WH8259> down <WH8259> from His holy <WH6944> height; <WH4791> From heaven <WH8064> the Lord <WH3068> gazed <WH5027> upon the earth, <WH776>
To hear <WH8085> the groaning <WH603> of the prisoner; <WH615> To set <WH6605> free <WH6605> those <WH1121> who <WH1121> were doomed <WH1121> to death; <WH8546>
That [men] may tell <WH5608> of the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068> in Zion, <WH6726> And His praise <WH8416> in Jerusalem; <WH3389>
When the peoples <WH5971> are gathered <WH6908> together, <WH9191> And the kingdoms, <WH4467> to serve <WH5647> the Lord. <WH3068>
He has weakened <WH6031> my strength <WH3581> in the way; <WH1870> He has shortened <WH9527> my days. <WH3117>
I say, <WH559> "O my God, <WH410> do not take <WH5927> me away <WH5927> in the midst <WH2677> of my days, <WH3117> Thy years <WH8141> are throughout all <WH1755> generations. <WH1755>
"Of old <WH6440> Thou didst found <WH3245> the earth; <WH776> And the heavens <WH8064> are the work <WH4639> of Thy hands. <WH3027>

"Even they will perish, but Thou dost endure; <WH6> And all <WH5975> of them will wear <WH3605> out like a garment; <WH1086> Like clothing <WH899> Thou wilt change <WH3830> them, and they will be changed. <WH2498>
"But Thou art the same, <WH1931> And Thy years <WH8141> will not come <WH8552> to an end. <WH8552>
"The children <WH1121> of Thy servants <WH5650> will continue, <WH7931> And their descendants <WH2233> will be established <WH3559> before <WH6440> Thee."
